text: Patriarch Nicholas of Alexandria may refer to: * Nicholas I of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 901–907 and 912–925 * Nicholas II of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 984–996 * Nicholas III of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 1084–1111 * Nicholas IV of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 1147–1151
title: Patriarch Nicholas of Constantinople
